titleInfo.title: Small talk is more than chit-chat: Exploiting structures of casual conversations for a virtual agent

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Mattar, N. & Wachsmuth, I. (2012). Krüger (Hrsg.), KI 2012: Advances in Artificial Intelligence (S. 119-130). Berlin, Heidelberg: Springer Berlin Heidelberg. doi:10.1007/978-3-642-33347-7_11.
